title: Bug 2496Failing 'open with system editor' should default back (1GFBF3C)
description: If you try to open a file that does not have a system editor, you will get an error 'Unable to openexternal editor for <file'.If this occurs, the default editor should be reset.Right now the editorremains as the System Editor so double clicking on the file again will give the same error.NOTES:
